verses.name: 2 Kings 15:1
verses.text: In the twenty and seventh year of Jeroboam king of Israel began Azariah son of Amaziah king of Judah to reign.

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:2
verses.text: Sixteen years old was he when he began to reign, and he reigned two and fifty years in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Jecholiah of Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:3
verses.text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his father Amaziah had done;

verses.name: 2 Kings 15:4
verses.text: Save that the high places were not removed: the people sacrificed and burnt incense still on the high places.
